com.konakart.blif

Interface EventMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventMgr

    public interface EventMgrIf
    EventMgrIf Interface which an implementation of this manager must adhere to.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHighestIndex() 
      KKEventIf[] getKKEvents(KKEventSearchIf search, DataDescriptorIf desc)
      Search for events
      int insertKKEvent(KKEventIf event)

    • Method Detail

      • getKKEvents

        KKEventIf[] getKKEvents(KKEventSearchIf search,
                      DataDescriptorIf desc)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Search for events
        Parameters:
        search - KKEventSearchIf search object that defines the records to retrieve
        desc - DataDescriptorIf generic search object that can be used to set the offset, limit and order by clauses. Options for order by are:
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_CODE_ASCENDING
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_CODE_DESCENDING
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_ASCENDING
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_DESCENDING
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_ID
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM1_ASCENDING
        • com.konakart.app.DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_CUSTOM1_DESCENDING
        Returns:
        an array of KKEvent objects that meet the selection criteria
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getHighestIndex

        int getHighestIndex()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns:
        the highest index in the kk_event table. If there are no records present in the table it will return 0
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertKKEvent

        int insertKKEvent(KKEventIf event)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Insert an event
        Parameters:
        event - a KKEvent object
        Returns:
        the id of the inserted event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
